Title: The Barefoot Executive
Writer: Joseph L. McEveety (screenplay), Lila Garrett (story), Bernie Kahn (story), Stewart C. Billett (story)
Actors: Kurt Russell, Joe Flynn, Harry Morgan, Wally Cox
Plot: A young man who works in the mailroom at a TV network wants to move up the corporate ladder but finds himself stymied by his selfish boss. By chance he discovers that his neighbor's chimpanzee has a knack for picking successful TV programs. He uses the chimp's programming skills to land himself a job in the programming department of the network.
